text: An interhalogen is a chemical compound. It is made by two halogens reacting with each other. Normally interhalogens are quite toxic and reactive. An example would be chlorine trifluoride or bromine monochloride. == Uses == Interhalogens are strong oxidizers. They are also used to add halogen atoms to other molecules (halogenation). Category:Halogen compounds
title: Interhalogen
